import React from "react"; export default class Search extends React.Component{ state = { search: '', type: 'all' } handleKey = (event) => { if (event.key === 'Enter') { this.props.searchMovie(this.state.search) } } render() { return(
this.setState({search: e.target.value})} onKeyDown={this.handleKey}/>
) } }
